title: API-TP-"Can Buy or Sell as Free Player"

comments.author: Lawton Campbell.8517
comments.body: I actually hadn’t thought of that. I’ll definitely look into it; not sure where that whitelist lives right now.

comments.author: anzenketh.3759
comments.body: I was just going to ask this. It would be useful information.

comments.author: Crell.6401
comments.body: Will you guys be exposing which items a F2P player can buy or sell on the TP? Via the API would rock!
